subject: Career
title: The Identity Shift in Career Transitions
description: One-minute skill: The Identity Shift in Career Transitions.

hook.text: She was a teacher for 15 years. After switching to UX design, she still introduced herself as a teacher.

buildup.text: Career transitions aren't just job changes. They're identity transformations â€” and identity resists change.

discovery.text: Herminia Ibarra's research: identity shifts happen through action first, then mindset follows.

twist.text: Waiting until you 'feel ready' delays the shift. Start acting in the new role and identity catches up.

climax.text: Introduce yourself as what you're becoming, not what you were. Language shapes identity.

punchline.text: You don't think your way into a new career. You act your way in.

quiz.question: How do identity shifts happen in career transitions according to Ibarra?
options: Through action first, then mindset follows
By thinking about it until you feel ready
Instantly when you get a new job
